Barbara McClintock is the only woman to be awarded an unshared Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine.

Horror in 2018: the year of A+ stories about grieving over the death of a loved one

Both 2018’s best horror movie (HEREDITARY) and series (HAUNTING OF HILL HOUSE) deal w/ that subject. Both cut me deep for that reason, likely because I lost my dad two years ago. I still feel it.
